name: The Phrog, The Tuxedo and The Chaos
name_original: The Phrog, The Tuxedo and The Chaos
description:
Here it is, after only a month of doing unity, and being only 11 years old, my 3rd ever Unity project for my first game jam: The Phrog, The Tuxedo And the Chaos.

Description:

You play as Sir Phrog Frog, a professional frog who has 2 goals: Fight the robots and cause chaos.

Controls:

Basic top down shooter controls:

WASD movement

Left click shooting

Move the mouse to aim

FAQ

Q: Why is there no sound?

A: When I tried to import my SFX and music, Unity threw me an error, and it didn't work

Q: Why does the player rotate 360 degrees

A:I drew the player model after I did the player movement, and only then realized it would rotate like that. I did not want to redo the player movement or the frog because I was really proud of both, and both took way too long just to scrap.

Q: Why does this game feel unfinished?

A: I'm only 11 and this is my first game jam and third unity project. 

Q:Why doesn't some stuff work

A: Everything seems to be working on my machine, so its probably just itch
